channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CXF-8957] The org.apache.cxf.systest.jaxrs.JAXRSMultipartTest randomly hangs under JDK-21
item.description:
It has been noticed that many JDK-21 builds hang randomly on Jenkins when running  org.apache.cxf.systest.jaxrs.JAXRSMultipartTest test cases, one example below:

 
[INFO] Apache CXF Transport System Tests JMS .............. SUCCESS [01:16 min]
[INFO] Apache CXF JAX-RS System Tests ..................... FAILURE [ 01:10 h]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time: 02:19 h
[INFO] Finished at: 2023-11-16T00:36:48Z
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-surefire-plugin:3.2.2:test (default-test) on project cxf-systests-jaxrs:
[ERROR]
[ERROR] Please refer to /home/jenkins/jenkins-agent/workspace/CXF_pipeline_main/systests/jaxrs/target/surefire-reports for the individual test results.
[ERROR] Please refer to dump files (if any exist) [date].dump, [date]-jvmRun[N].dump and [date].dumpstream.
[ERROR] The forked VM terminated without properly saying goodbye. VM crash or System.exit called?
[ERROR] Command was /bin/sh c cd '/home/jenkins/jenkins-agent/workspace/CXF_pipeline_main/systests/jaxrs' && '/usr/local/asfpackages/java/adoptium-jdk-21.0.1+12/bin/java' '-ea' 'add-opens' 'java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED' 'add-opens' 'java.base/java.net=ALL-UNNAMED' '-add-opens' 'java.base/sun.net.www.protocol.https=ALL-UNNAMED' '-Dnone=' '-jar' '/home/jenkins/jenkins-agent/workspace/CXF_pipeline_main/systests/jaxrs/target/surefire/surefirebooter-20231115232616520_768.jar' '/home/jenkins/jenkins-agent/workspace/CXF_pipeline_main/systests/jaxrs/target/surefire' '2023-11-15T22-20-39_709-jvmRun1' 'surefire-20231115232616520_766tmp' 'surefire_170-20231115232616520_767tmp'
[ERROR] Error occurred in starting fork, check output in log
[ERROR] Process Exit Code: 143
[ERROR] Crashed tests:

[ERROR] org.apache.maven.surefire.booter.SurefireBooterForkException: The forked VM terminated without properly saying goodbye. VM crash or System.exit called?
[ERROR] Command was /bin/sh c cd '/home/jenkins/jenkins-agent/workspace/CXF_pipeline_main/systests/jaxrs' && '/usr/local/asfpackages/java/adoptium-jdk-21.0.1+12/bin/java' '-ea' 'add-opens' 'java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED' 'add-opens' 'java.base/java.net=ALL-UNNAMED' '-add-opens' 'java.base/sun.net.www.protocol.https=ALL-UNNAMED' '-Dnone=' '-jar' '/home/jenkins/jenkins-agent/workspace/CXF_pipeline_main/systests/jaxrs/target/surefire/surefirebooter-20231115232616520_768.jar' '/home/jenkins/jenkins-agent/workspace/CXF_pipeline_main/systests/jaxrs/target/surefire' '2023-11-15T22-20-39_709-jvmRun1' 'surefire-20231115232616520_766tmp' 'surefire_170-20231115232616520_767tmp'

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
It seems like we have been affected by https://bugs.openjdk.org/browse/JDK-8316580, here is the stack trace for the hanging test process:

main [1] (TIMED_WAITING)
   java.lang.Object.wait0 line: not available [native method]
   java.lang.Object.wait line: 366 
   java.lang.Thread.join line: 2072 
   java.lang.Thread.join line: 2200 
   jdk.internal.net.http.HttpClientImpl.awaitTermination line: 628 
   java.net.http.HttpClient.close line: 900 
   jdk.internal.net.http.HttpClientFacade.close line: 192 
   org.apache.cxf.transport.http.HttpClientHTTPConduit.close line: 125 
   org.apache.cxf.endpoint.AbstractConduitSelector.close line: 77 
   org.apache.cxf.jaxrs.client.AbstractClient.close line: 367 
   org.apache.cxf.systest.jaxrs.JAXRSMultipartTest.testLargerThanDefaultHeader line: 1101 
   java.lang.invoke.LambdaForm$DMH/0x0000013fdb15c400.invokeVirtual line: not available 
   java.lang.invoke.LambdaForm$MH/0x0000013fdb15cc00.invoke line: not available 
   java.lang.invoke.Invokers$Holder.invokeExact_MT line: not available 
   jdk.internal.reflect.DirectMethodHandleAccessor.invokeImpl line: 153 
   jdk.internal.reflect.DirectMethodHandleAccessor.invoke line: 103 
   java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke line: 580
